members.name: Chanel
members.description: An icon of French fashion, Chanel is synonymous with timeless elegance and sophistication. Founded by Coco Chanel, the brand revolutionized women’s clothing with minimalist style, iconic perfumes like No. 5, and prestigious haute couture.

members.name: Gucci
members.description: An Italian luxury brand known for its bold, innovative style, Gucci blends traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. It is globally recognized for its fashion-forward clothing, accessories, and creative collaborations.

members.name: Dior
members.description: Founded by Christian Dior, this French fashion house is a leader in haute couture and luxury beauty. Renowned for its classic femininity and refined silhouettes, Dior combines tradition with innovation in fashion, fragrances, and cosmetics.

members.name: Louis Vuitton
members.description: A global symbol of exclusivity, Louis Vuitton is a top brand for leather goods, luggage, and high-end fashion. Since 1854, it has paired artisanal heritage with modern design and iconic collaborations.

members.name: Michael Kors
members.description: An American brand offering accessible luxury, Michael Kors is known for stylish handbags, watches, and elegant casual wear. Its practical yet glamorous designs are popular with fashion lovers around the world.

members.name: Kerastase
members.description: A premium haircare brand by L’Oréal, Kérastase specializes in personalized treatments backed by advanced science. Trusted in salons worldwide, it's a leader in performance-driven hair wellness.

members.name: Prada
members.description: An Italian luxury fashion house known for its avant-garde and minimalist style. Prada is a trendsetter that blends innovation, quality, and intellectual design in clothing, accessories, and more.

members.name: Hermés
members.description: A French maison celebrated for its exceptional craftsmanship in leather, silk, and watchmaking. Famous for iconic items like the Birkin bag, Hermès represents tradition, exclusivity, and top-tier quality.
